about_the_game:
Dark, sinister, brooding and ready to drive fear into the hearts of all those who hear! This brilliantly dark pack blends twisted and eerie sound fx, orchestration and ambience with lonely, haunted acoustic piano, the ultimate go-to horror music instrument of choice! Music for openings, searching, mystery, danger, and more, you'll have all your scary scenes covered with this perfectly unsettling 39 BGM song pack. Plus 10 haunting sounding 1 minute ambient drones and 20 ME to bring your pack to life while your heroes avoid death!

Features:

* 39 BGM
* 20 ME
* 10 SE (long ambient drones)
* Royalty-free music in .ogg and ,m4a formats
* For use in Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

1. DHCM1_BGM01_MainTheme
